data.field: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd"> <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/XML" xml:lang="en"> <head> <title>All Mouth and No Ears</title> [{htmlhead}] </head> <body> <form id="yapper" method="post" action="?" enctype="application/x-www-form-urlencoded"> <input type="hidden" name="displaytype" value="raw" /> <input type="hidden" name="node_id" value="349020" /> <input type="hidden" name="op" value="message" /> <input type="text" name="message" maxlength=255 /> <input type="submit" name="message_send" value="talk" /> </form> </body> </html>
